step2.ptxt: The wireless door lock control system has the following functions:

entry.ptxt: Pressing the lock button of the transmitter locks all doors and the back door.
Pressing the unlock button of the transmitter unlocks all doors and the back door.
If none of the doors are opened for 30 seconds after being unlocked by the wireless door lock control system, all the doors are locked again automatically.

item.ptxt: The hazard lights flash once during locking and flash twice during unlocking to inform the driver that the operation has been completed.
This function can be enabled and disabled according to the user's preference. For details, refer to the corresponding Repair Manual for this model.

entry.ptxt: The hazard lights flash once during locking and flash twice during unlocking to inform the driver that the operation has been completed.

item.ptxt: The security horn assembly sounds once when locking and twice when unlocking to inform the driver that the operation has been completed. This function is not active in the default setting.
This function can be enabled and disabled according to the user's preference. For details, refer to the corresponding Repair Manual for this model.

entry.ptxt: Pressing the panic button on the transmitter for 1.5 seconds or more operates the theft deterrent system alarm for 30 seconds. The alarm can be canceled by pressing any button other than the panic button.

item.ptxt: If any door is open or ajar, pressing the lock button on the transmitter will cause the security horn assembly to sound for approx. 1 second.
This function can be enabled and disabled according to the user's preference. For details, refer to the corresponding Repair Manual for this model.

step3.ptxt: The transmitter for the wireless door lock control has a lock button, an unlock button and a panic button*.

step2.ptxt: If there is a malfunction in the system, the No. 1 integration relay stores the Diagnostic Trouble Codes (DTCs) in its memory. For details, refer to the corresponding Repair Manual for this model.
